snippet: Bold, bracing sour beers like gueuze, kriek and lambic will slice right through a meal from aperitif to cheese, stymied only at dessert.
abstract: Pairings column features a recipe for seafood choucroute to go with sour beers.

snippet: Microsoft and Nokia have yet to prove whether their marriage will give birth to healthy handset sales. One analyst is not expecting much. James Faucette, an analyst at Pacific Crest Securities, cut his forecast for Nokia Windows phone sales this q...
abstract: Microsoft and Nokia have yet to prove whether their marriage will give birth to healthy handset sales. One analyst is not expecting much. James Faucette, an analyst at Pacific Crest Securities, cut his forecast for Nokia Windows phone sales this quarter to 500,000 units from two million.

headline.main: Nokia's Microsoft Phones May Not Get Traction, Analyst Says

snippet: How can you avoid the agony of overeating on Thanksgiving while still enjoying the stuffing?
abstract: Thanksgiving, which is essentially a state-sponsored, socially acceptable binge, often results in bloated bellies, wider waistlines and outgunned couches; there is no easy way for most people to prepare their bodies for gluttony; fasting the day before Thanksgiving does not work but doctors, psychologists and experts in overeating all say that mental preparation is crucial to creating willpower.

snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times search the Web each day for the most interesting items. Today's selection includes pieces on personal finance advice for the 1 percent, like the widow of Steven P. Jobs, and a former Twitt...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times search the Web each day for the most interesting items. Today's selection includes pieces on personal finance advice for the 1 percent, like the widow of Steven P. Jobs, and a former Twitter engineer's reflections on the company.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Personal Finance Tips and a Look Inside Twitter

snippet: While Isa, a warm, rustic spot in Williamsburg, can be idiosyncratic in the best sense, it’s occasionally strange.
abstract: Eric Asimov reviews restaurant Isa in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.

snippet: Our approach to Thanksgiving leftovers could help us eat better all year long.

headline.main: Thanksgiving Thrift: The Holiday as a Model for Sustainable Cooking
headline.print_headline: Thanksgiving Thrift: The Holiday as a Model for Sustainable Cooking

snippet: Private banks, which have been slow to embrace mobile technologies, expect to interact more with their clients through social media and smartphone apps.
abstract: Private banks, which have been slow to embrace mobile technologies, expect to offer their clients more services through social media and smartphone apps.

headline.main: With Apps, Wealth Management Goes Mobile
headline.print_headline: Taking Aim at Tomorrow’s Clients, Wealth Managers Begin to Embrace Mobile Apps

snippet: Facebook plans to create its own smartphone, Penguin will end digital library lending of new titles and Sarah Palin was nearly pulled from Fox News.
abstract: Facebook plans to create its own smartphone, Penguin will end digital library lending of new titles and Sarah Palin was nearly pulled from Fox News.
